title: List of Australian Olympic medallists in athletics
text:
Australia has competed in <a href="Athletics%20at%20the%20Summer%20Olympics">athletics</a> in all <a href="Summer%20Olympics">Summer Olympics</a>. <a href="Edwin%20Flack">Edwin Flack</a> in winning the Men's <a href="Athletics%20at%20the%201896%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20800%20metres">800 m</a> and <a href="Athletics%20at%20the%201896%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%201500%20metres">1500 m</a> at the <a href="1896%20Summer%20Olympics">1896 Summer Olympics</a> won Australia's first athletics and Olympics medals and was its first gold medallist. Athletics is the Australia's second most <a href="Australia%20at%20the%20Olympics%23Medals%20by%20summer%20sport">successful Olympic sport</a> after swimming.
Event Medal Summary 1896-2016.
Summary of Olympics athletics medals won by Australian male and female athletes. Australian athletes have not won medals in the following events scheduled for the <a href="2020%20Summer%20Olympics">2020 Summer Olympics</a>: <a href="5000%20metres">5000 metres</a>, <a href="3000%20metres%20steeplechase">3000 m steeplechase</a>, <a href="110%20metres%20hurdles">Men's 110 m hurdles</a>, <a href="Combined%20events%20at%20the%20Olympics">decathlon</a> and the <a href="Hammer%20throw%20at%20the%20Olympics">hammer throw</a>.
- n/a - not a discipline for the gender
Medallists 1896-2016.
List of individual and relay Australian medallists.
